name: AutoML
description:
These WhizzML script will let the user run a **fully automated
Machine Learning pipeline** in BigML. It need the AutoML Library, more info [here](https://github.com/whizzml/examples/tree/master/automl).


From a train, holdout and test datasets, the following tasks will
be automatically done:

-  `Unsupervised Models Generation`: Creating the following
  **unsupervised models**: `Cluster`, `Anomaly Detector`, `Association
  Discovery` (with leverage and lift as search_strategy), `PCA` and
**  `Topic Model` (for datasets that contain text fields).**

 - `Feature Generation`: Using the unsupervised models created
  previously to append automatically generated new features to all the
**  user given datasets.**

 - `Feature Selection`: Reducing, automatically, the number of fields
  of the datasets using the **Recursive Feature Eliminination**
  algorithm. This step is bypassed if the total number of fields is
**  lower than 50 (or 30 if `shallow_search` is `True`)**

 - `Model Selection` Using OptiML to find the best models and using
  the top 3 models to create a `Fusion` model to predict all the test
  dataset instances. The script will return an evaluation of the final
  model too.


Find more info in [package readme](https://github.com/whizzml/examples/tree/master/automl) and [script readme](https://github.com/whizzml/examples/blob/master/automl/automl-script/readme.md)

inputs.name: holdout-dataset
inputs.description: Hold-out dataset id, only to perform final evaluation

inputs.name: automl-execution
inputs.description: For test executions. Previous execution of this script, to reuse created resources during training, e.g. execution/5d272205eba31d61920005cd

inputs.name: shallow-search
inputs.description: If true, AutoML will perform a more shallow (but faster) search of the best features and models

inputs.name: configuration-params
inputs.description: Execution configuration parameters. They will be overwritten if automl-execution is given. See README for more information

outputs.name: output-dataset
outputs.description: Output test dataset with predictions from the fusion

outputs.name: output-evaluation
outputs.description: Evaluation of the fusion model with the holdout dataset

outputs.name: unsupervised-models
outputs.description: List of unsupervised models created from train-dataset
